00022 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00023 /// ITreeTracer
00024 ///
00025 /// @description  This is an interface class. It is the base class of all trace
00026 ///               algorithms. When subclassing it, make sure and override the
00027 ///               name function to return the name of the new trace. An example
00028 ///               of a subclass is the CMinimaxTracer.
00029 ///
00030 /// @limitations  None
00031 ///
00032 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00033 class ITreeTracer
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     ITreeTracer();
00037     virtual ~ITreeTracer();
00038 
00039     virtual QString name() const;
00040     virtual STreeTrace *trace( const STreeNode *rootNode,
00041                                int depth, int qsDepth ) const = 0;
00042 };
00043 
00044 #endif
